Name: Smoky Mocha Spritz
Ingredients: 25 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of two segments of dark Toblerone chocolate on the rim.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: Coffee and chocolate flavours with a faint smokiness, invigorated with sparkling wine.
